intro.title: 🌸 Welcome to Animdle!
intro.text: Dive into the world of anime by guessing titles based on their openings.</br>Are you ready for the challenge?

video.title: 🎥 Video Player
video.text: Play, pause, or replay the video here.</br>It might be tricky at first, but with each play, you'll become a master!

guess.title: ✏️ Make Your Guess!
guess.text: Enter your anime title guess here. Not sure?</br>You can skip, but it'll cost you a life.

lives.title: ❤️ Track Your Lives
lives.text: Keep an eye on your hearts!</br>Lose them all, and it's game over.</br>A green heart? You've triumphed in the challenge!

videoSwitch.title: 📺 Video Switch
videoSwitch.text:
If you are afraid of spoilers,
you can turn off the video here.
Be careful, you'll have to rely on your ears!
When there is a spoiler you'll be warned.

modes.title: 🔄 Game Modes
modes.text: Choose between different game modes here.</br>Explore endings and the hardcore versions.

end.title: Best of luck and dive into the anime adventure! 🚀

enable it under your responsability.
